text: Evelyn King (born July 1, 1960) is an American singer. She mostly performs disco and rhythm and blues. She had the hit singles "Love Come Down" and "Shame". King was born in the Bronx, New York. She was raised in Philadelphia. Category:Singers from Pennsylvania Category:Singers from New York City Category:American R&B; singers Category:1960 births Category:Living people
title: Evelyn King
